BasicRecipes.name: Chest
BasicRecipes.info: A chest is used to store items or blocks. It looks similar to your inventory. Chests can hold up to 27 stacks of either blocks or items. If two chests are placed side by side, it becomes a double chest. Double chests can hold the double amont of one chest, which is 54 stacks.

ToolRecipes.name: Axes
ToolRecipes.info: Used to chop wood and pumpkins, faster than by hand.
ToolRecipes.ingredients: Sticks + Wood Planks or Cobblestone or Iron Ingots or Gold Ingots or Diamonds

WeaponRecipes.name: Arrow
WeaponRecipes.info: Arrows can be used as ammunition for a bow or dispenser. Deals damage to players and creatures when they hit.

ArmorRecipes.name: Boots
ArmorRecipes.info: Foot armor that adds extra protection against attacks, falling, fire and drowning.
ArmorRecipes.ingredients: Leather or Gold Ingots or Iron Ingots or Fire or Diamonds

ManufacturedRecipes.name: Andesite
ManufacturedRecipes.info: Andesite is a type of igneous rock. Andesite can be mined using any pickaxe. If mined without a pickaxe, it will drop nothing. Used as decoration.

TransportationRecipes.name: Activator Rail
TransportationRecipes.info: Used to activate TNT Minecarts or Minecarts with Hoppers.

MechanismRecipes.name: Daylight Sensor
MechanismRecipes.info: Sends out a redstone signal during sunlight. The signal strenght depends on the sunlight intensity.

FoodRecipes.name: Beetroot Soup
FoodRecipes.info: Beetroot soup can be eaten to restore 6 hunger and 7.2 hunger saturation. Beetroot soup is a liquid food item in the Pocket and PC edition.

MiscellaneousRecipes.name: Armor Stand
MiscellaneousRecipes.info: Armor Stands are entities that are able to hold and display wearable items. Can display armor, mob heads or pumpkins.

EnchantmentAndBrewingRecipes.name: Blaze Powder
EnchantmentAndBrewingRecipes.info: Can be combined with an Ender Pearl to make an Eye of Ender. Can also be used to craft Magma Cream, Fire charges and Potions of Strength.

DyeRecipes.name: Bone Meal
DyeRecipes.info: Bone Meal or white dye, is used to color wool or sheeps light white.

WoolRecipes.name: Black Wool
WoolRecipes.info: Used as decoration or building material.
